Title: Reality check video
Notes: Record a 30–60 sec honest video. Topic: 'Flying is harder than I expected. What went wrong today?'

Title: Flight fragments (no sound)
Notes: Select 2–3 cockpit clips. Add simple text overlay about learning. Ambient music only.

Title: Ground school diary
Notes: Film 10–15 sec: books, notes, coffee. Text or voice: 'Theory is hard. But this is part of it.'

Title: Voice note reflection
Notes: Record a short voice note: 'What was the hardest part of today?'. Overlay on any footage.

Title: One photo – one truth
Notes: Post one photo. Caption: one honest sentence about today.

Title: Weekly reflection video
Notes: 60 sec reflection. Topic: 'What I struggled with this week and why I continue.'

Title: Light edit or repost
Notes: Light edit any clip from the week or repost with a new honest caption.

Title: Weekly reflection (text only)
Notes: Text post or Story. 3 lines: struggle, lesson, reason to continue.
